verses.verse: And I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%>, <S%H376>and<s%>, behold, a man with a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H2256>line<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1980>I<s%>, Whither goest <S%H559>thou<s%>? And he said unto <S%H4058>me<s%>, To measure <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H753>thereof<s%>, and what is the length thereof.
And <S%H4397><s%>, behold, the angel that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me went <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4397>angel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to meet <S%H7125>him<s%>,

and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7323>him<s%>, Run, <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H1975>this<s%> young <S%H5288>man<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> as villages without <S%H6519>walls<s%>, by reason of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> and <S%H929>cattle<s%> <S%H8432>therein<s%>.

For <S%H5002>I<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, will be unto her a <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and I will be the <S%H3519>glory<s%> in the midst of <S%H8432>her<s%>.

Ho <S%H1945><s%>, <S%H1945>ho<s%>, <S%H5127>flee<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for I have spread you <S%H6566>abroad<s%> as the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Ho <S%H1945><s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, <S%H4422>escape<s%>, thou that <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> with the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: <S%H310>After<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> hath he <S%H7971>sent<s%> me unto the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which <S%H7997>plundered<s%> <S%H5060>you<s%>; for he that toucheth you <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H892>apple<s%> of his <S%H5869>eye<s%>.

For <S%H5130><s%>, behold, I will shake my <S%H3027>hand<s%> over <S%H7998>them<s%>, and they shall be a spoil to those that <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H3045>them<s%>; and ye shall know that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath sent <S%H7971>me<s%>.

Sing <S%H7442><s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; <S%H935>for<s%>, lo, I come, and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H5002>thee<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H3867>join<s%> themselves to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, and shall be my <S%H5971>people<s%>; and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3045>thee<s%>, and thou shalt know that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has sent me unto <S%H7971>thee<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> as his <S%H2506>portion<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H127>land<s%>, and shall yet <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
Be <S%H2013>silent<s%>, all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for he is waked <S%H5782>up<s%> out of his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation<s%>.
